title: Music Room 1314 - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Cute Story   Modern Day   Music   Past Trauma   Proactive Protagonist   Short Story
author: 赤血风铃
description:
Everyone only has one 'lifetime' in each life. 

Someone once said: People come into the world with an incomplete soul. Moreover, it will take a lifetime to find their other half, a Soul Mate. Only by finding them will your soul be complete. 

Inside the music academy, two halves of the soul meet because of music. 

Can they really be together forever when they met in music room 1314?>
